DOC.brief_title: Study Comparison Treatment Effect Between Gastric Bypass Exenatide Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Methods : 60 Type 2 diabetes hospital divide 3 group : group A ( 20 patient give basal treatment ) , group B ( 20 patient give basal Exenatide treatment , group C（20 patient give basal Gastric Bypass treatment ) . The age , height , weight , blood glucose , glycosylated hemoglobin A1c（HbA1c） , homeostasis model assessment ( HOMA-IR ) , lipid , blood pressure , course disease , ejection fraction ( EF ) , fractional shortening ( FS ) , diameter leave ventricle late diastolic stage ( LVEDd ) , thickness ventricular septa（IVSD ) posterior wall right ventricle late diastolic stage ( LVPWd ) record respectively . Left ventricular mass index ( LVMI ) , relative wall thickness ( RWT ) calculate High-sensitive C-reactive protein ( HsCRP ) , adiponectin Tumor necrosis factor-α（TNF-α） detect Baseline . After group 's treatment , Change baseline index record , Multifactor logistic regression analyze correlation positive index .
